title: Duradin- Master of the key weapons.
body:
Duradin- Master of the key weapons.

HP535 +61 3.25/5sec +0.73
MP 210 +72 2.18/5sec +0.51
AD63 +4.1
Atk Speed 0.721 +0.016
Armor 23 +2.1
MR 27 +3.4
Speed 345

Passive: Glorious Uprising/ Flowing wind.
Upon complete summoning of a weapon, Duradin gains special effects.
Summoning sword, Duradin becomes invulnerable for .35/.45/.55/.65 seconds and next strike deals 15/20/25/30% Bonus Damage.

Upon Summoning the bow, for 2/2.5/3/3.5 seconds, all attacks automatically crit. Projectiles become so fast it is instant, unblockable.



Q: Using sword: 1.Whispering Death/ 3.knock out Cost  1. 75MP 3. 60MP 28/27/26/25/24 second cooldown after use.
  Using Bow: 1.Retaliate/ 3.Wind arrows
 ***HOW THIS WORKS***
Activating Q when using Sword, or bow holds different combos.
Each combo starts with Q, which is 1. using Q and activates E, which is 2, letting 2 take effect activates 3. of the combo, which is Q again.
Using E's 2. cast, also changes this straight to 3.
Sword: 1. Whispering Death. Duradin gains 35 movement speed per second for 4 seconds, his auto attack after this gains dash and 20/25/30/35/40% bonus damage.
       ** If an enemy is in the way, he will hit that enemy instead of the target.
       3. Knock out, Duradin phases behind his target and unleashes an lunge, dealing 115%AD +55/80/105/140/175 Physical Damage. Knocks them back 450 range.

Bow: 1. Retaliate: Duradin spins his bow kncoking back the enemy in front of him 300 range, dealing 35% AD +40/70/100/130/160 Damage.
     3. Wind Arrows: Fires 3 waves of wind in front of him once per .33 seconds. Enemies hit with this are pushed back 75 range, slowed by 99% for .1 seconds.
        All projectles are effected as well.

W: 2. Parry/2. Leave only bodies.    Only activated when Q or E are used.
 Sword: Parry, active within 3 seconds of Q, for 0.6 seconds the first enemy auto attack to him will be blocked and the enemy stunned for 1 second.
 Bow: Flips backwards 325 range, shoots a row of arrows while fliping,  650 range. each hit deals 85%AD +15/35/55/75/95 damage. Can hit more than 1 if the enemy
dashes into the next few arrows.

If there is a champion, allied or not behind him within 100 units, he cannot cast this.

E: 1.Summon Shield/ 2. Shield Bash  35MP Cannot be used without using Q FIRST.
1. Summons a shield, changing his sword or bow into a shield, he cannot attack but he gains 40/70/100/130/160 Armor and MR. and 10/15/20/25/30%  Damage negation.
2. Shield bash, bashes an enemy with a shield, knocking them back 300 range, dealing 30/40/50/60/70%AD +25/50/75/100/125 Damage. They are dazed after, slowing 25%
for 3 seconds. This unsummons his shield and back into his previous weapon.

R: Level 1 at level 1.  Switch. No cost. 25/23/21/19sec cooldown
Switches weapons, weapons melt into a cyclone of particles and reforms into the other weapon over 3 seconds. If he is stunned the animation will be cancelled.

Upgrading Switch, the weapons become stronger. Sword gains 15/25/35 Bonus damage per level of Switch. Passive invulnerability gains .1 second per level
and strike deals 5% bonus damage per level.

Bow, per level gains 10 movement speed and 5 damage. Passive lasts + .5sec per level of this ability

replies.body:
Yet another champ that can do everything.
Like Jason said, just stop.

You've given him not one, but three (potentially four) disengages as well as multiple gap closers.
You have an AD champ that can tank with the best of them with no defensive items. Not to mention a parry that stuns...
Slows, stuns, knockbacks all on the same champ. And not even a tank/support.

All the damage, all the mobility, all the defenses any champ could wish for.

Put down the crackpipe please.
idk, it seems pre interesting to play to me, even though it is broken.

> [{quoted}](name=I Cant Gank,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=I2RV7RQP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-11T04:56:45.281+0000)
>
> idk, it seems pre interesting to play to me, even though it is broken.

You would say that, you created it.
Just stop, you don't know how balance works clearly.
